page.title: 20CREDITS
page.content:
Pages 2-4 and 6-7 were written by the following children aged 8 to 10 from St. Francis C.E. Junior School, Newton Aycliffe. Michael Carr, Paula Rooney, Ryan Fitzpatrick, Daniel Mitchinson, Colette Cook and Ashley Ayre.
Pages 8-12 were written by the following children, aged 10 to 11, from St. Joseph's R.C. Primary School, Newton Aycliffe. Paul Baird, Joanne Hind, Anjanette Jones, Eamonn Nugent, John Lawler and Joanne Mulhearn.
Pages 13-19 were written by the following children,aged 8 to 11, from Woodham Burn Junior School, Newton Aycliffe. Phillip Hall, Graham Bennet, Marie Cumberland, Jonathan Metcalfe, Louise Csengel, Mark Foster, Geoffrey Leadbeatter, Jane Adams.
